name: Planet 3479
description:
you are a newly pressed robot from the fungi collector's unit of planet 3479

your job is to grow the mushrooms and harvest them 
by doing so, you power your community harvester which sends resources home and opens the portal to your next assignment 

Controls:

- Arrow Keys or WASD to move,
- Spacebar to Grow Mushrooms
- Down arrow / "S" to chop them down

Run out of fuel? Refill at the Harvester.
